name: Hammurabi's Laws
description:
It is the year 1745 BCE.

You are living in Ancient Mesopotamia under the rule of King Ḫammurabi.

Ḫammurabi is most well known for his Law code which consists of 282 laws carved in Akkadian cuneiform on a stele. 

Your goal is to play a day in the life of a character of your choosing and try and survive without breaking any of Ḫammurabi's Laws or upsetting the Gods. 

Available characters: Free Woman, Merchant, Wine Seller, and Physician. 

Good Luck!
